title: Understanding and Applying the Allure of Detail Effect in Educational Material Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Analyzing the impact of intriguing details in the mathematical problem-solving process on learning effectiveness and exploring methods to optimize it through learning goal-setting strategies

learning_goals: Learners can explain the impact of educational materials containing engaging details on the understanding and application of core content.
Learners can analyze the role of clear learning objectives in moderating the allure of detail effect
Learners can propose strategies for integrating alluring details using a PBL approach in project-based assessments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
